Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Defines film zone and excludes the film zone from the additional empire state film production credit
Summary: Defines film zone; excludes the film zone from the additional empire state film production credit.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to the definition of film zone and the exclusion of the film zone from the additional empire state film production credit
